Pathfinder Worker:
The Delusion Chamber is a dream maze we discovered not long ago. Just like Rim Kamaloka, it is presumed to be a manifestation of the darkness invading our world.
It exists in the empty space between dream worlds. In terms of shape and structure, we presume it is related to the Dimensional Rift, but we know little for now...
However, we do know that there are rewards for defeating the enemies who inhabit this place. If you have the courage, perhaps you would be interested in challenging the Delusion Chamber?
